title: Stole, 19th century
medium:
Medium: Silk ribbons, glass beads, metal thread, and paillettes.
Technique: embroidered
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Lavender silk ribbon decorated at either end with a vase ornament, a cross border and fringe worked in red, blue, and yellow glass beads and in metal threads, foil, and paillettes; two rosettes of metal between borders.

tombstone.epitaph:
Stole, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: Silk ribbons, glass beads, metal thread, and paillettes.
Technique: embroidered. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-33.
